info.name: dA: hide this external-link arrow!
info.description: I HATE this small icon next to our external links. And you? If so, this script is for you!
info.additionalInfo:
This will simply hide that icon. Also, if you want to write things with an external link, you can read this: http://fav.me/d6p5j2m

You can see my deviantArt page here: http://mkody.deviantart.com/
Or you can follow me on Twitter (french): @MKody_
